00016 namespace mprace {
00017 
00018 class Pin;
00019 
00035 class RegisterAsPinTristate : public Pin {
00036 public:
00043         RegisterAsPinTristate(unsigned int *in_reg, unsigned int *out_reg, unsigned int *oe_reg) { 
00044                 in = in_reg;
00045                 out = out_reg;
00046                 oe = oe_reg;
00047                 
00048                 // In this implementation, the output is activated on the first set.
00049                 *(this->oe_reg) = 0x0;
00050         }
00051 
00056         virtual ~RegisterAsPinTristate() { }
00057 
00063         inline virtual void set(bool value) 
00064         {
00065                 if (!oe_set)
00066                         this->setOE();
00067                 
00068                 *(this->out_reg) = (value) ? 0xFFFFFFFF : 0x0; 
00069         }
00070 
00075         inline virtual void setOE() 
00076         { 
00077                 *(this->oe_reg) = 0xFFFFFFFF; 
00078                 oe_set = true;
00079         }
00080 
00086         inline virtual bool get() { return (*(this->in_reg) != 0x0); }
00087         
00092         inline void set() { this->set( true ); }
00093 
00098         inline void clear() { this->set( false ); }
00099 
00100 protected:
00101         /* Avoid copy constructor, and copy assignment operator */
00102 
00106         RegisterAsPinTristate(const RegisterPin&) {};
00107 
00111         RegisterAsPinTristate& operator=(const RegisterAsPinTristate&) { return *this; };
00112 
00113 private:
00114         unsigned int *in;
00115         unsigned int *out;
00116         unsigned int *oe;
00117         bool oe_set;
00118         
00119 }; /* class RegisterAsPinTristate */

00121 } /* namespace mprace */
